page.title: 10Gillie's Day (Aged 11)
page.content: At 8:00am I'm still snoring. Mum drags me out of bed. After scrubbing my teeth I go downstairs in my school uniform, eat my breakfast, get my bag and cycle to school. The whistle goes and we line up. Today is Wednesday and these are the lessons. First we go down to the hall for assembly. Then we go back to our classes for English. Our language work is from Ginn 360, there are work cards and sheets to fill in about a story. Maths next, we are copying angles.Then we watch a TV.programme which sets us a practical problem to solve. After lunch we watch a sex education programme called Living and Growing which all the fourth year watch before going to Hinchingbroke school. Next its games, I play rounders. After school I go to gardening club where we plant seeds. I cycle home, have a snack and watch TV.
